cc_bd_A.name: Chain of Thought
cc_bd_A.desc:
Affects skills related to <$cc.bd_A_1><@cc.rem>Psychokinesis</></> and <$cc.bd_A_2><@cc.rem>Manifestation of Consciousness</></>
Provided by the following Operators' skills:
Rosmontis

cc_bd_B.name: Soundless Resonance
cc_bd_B.desc:
Affects skills related to <$cc.bd_B_1><@cc.rem>Lingering Melody</></>, <$cc.bd_B_2><@cc.rem>Harmony Astray</></>, and <$cc.bd_B_3><@cc.rem>Wordless Anthem</></>
Provided by the following Operators' skills:
Ebenholz, Virtuosa, Bassline

cc_bd_a1.name: Perception Information

cc_c_abyssal2_1.name: Special Bonus
cc_c_abyssal2_1.desc: For every <$cc.g.abyssal><@cc.kw>Abyssal Hunter</></> operator stationed in a Factory, the Control Center provides <@cc.vup>5%</> Productivity for every Factory with an <$cc.g.abyssal><@cc.kw>Abyssal Hunter</></> operator stationed within it, up to a maximum of <@cc.vup>45%</> Productivity

cc_c_abyssal2_2.name: Special Bonus
cc_c_abyssal2_2.desc: For every <$cc.g.abyssal><@cc.kw>Abyssal Hunter</></> operator stationed in a Factory, the Control Center provides <@cc.vup>10%</> Productivity for every Factory with an <$cc.g.abyssal><@cc.kw>Abyssal Hunter</></> operator stationed within it, up to a maximum of <@cc.vup>90%</> Productivity

cc_c_abyssal2_3.name: Special Interaction Rules
cc_c_abyssal2_3.desc:
Takes priority over <$cc.m.var2><@cc.rem>Cooperative Will</></>, and does not stack
Does not stack with <$cc.m.pow1><@cc.rem>Automation α</></>, <$cc.m.pow2><@cc.rem>Automation β</></>, or <$cc.m.pow3><@cc.rem>Bionic Seadragon</></>, and the 'set to 0' effect will take priority

cc_c_room1.name: Certain Facilities
cc_c_room1.desc:
Includes the following facilities: 
Power Plant, HR Office, Reception Room

cc_c_room2.name: Other Facilities
cc_c_room2.desc:
Includes the following facilities: 
Power Plant, Factory, Trading Post, HR Office, Reception Room

cc_c_room3.name: Workplace
cc_c_room3.desc:

cc_c_skill.name: Certain Skills
cc_c_skill.desc:
Includes the following skills:
Capable Assistance, S.W.E.E.P., Snack Network, Cleaning Agreement, Substitute, Necessary Responsibility, Guarding, Tiny Leader, Self-Absorbed Million Dollar Smile, Marigold Poetry Gathering, Art of Defense

cc_t_strong2.name: Special Interaction Rules
cc_t_strong2.desc:
Cannot stack with <$cc.t.snsant1><@cc.rem>Heavenly Reward α</></>, <$cc.t.snsant2><@cc.rem>Heavenly Reward β</></>, and will take precedence instead
When <$cc.t.snsant1><@cc.rem>Heavenly Reward α</></>, <$cc.t.snsant2><@cc.rem>Heavenly Reward β</></> stacks with other skills, this skill will take effect on the resulting effect

cc_c_sui2_1.name: Special comparison rules
cc_c_sui2_1.desc: Compare hourly Morale recovery totals of <$cc.c.room2><@cc.kw>other buildings</></> provided by other Operator skills in the Control Center. The strongest effect applies.

cc_m_pow1.name: Automation α
cc_m_pow1.desc:
Provided by the following Operator(s):
Weedy, Eunectes, Passenger

cc_m_pow2.name: Automation β
cc_m_pow2.desc:
Provided by the following Operator(s):
Eunectes

cc_m_pow3.name: Bionic Seadragon
cc_m_pow3.desc:
Provided by the following Operator(s):
Weedy

cc_t_flow_gold.name: Pure Gold Production Line
cc_t_flow_gold.desc: For <@cc.kw>every</> <@cc.kw>Factory</> producing <@cc.kw>Pure Gold</>, Pure Gold Production Line <@cc.kw>+1</>

cc_w_ncdeer1.name: Causality
cc_w_ncdeer1.desc: Whenever a recipe that consumes <@cc.kw>4</> or less Morale fails to produce a byproduct, gain <@cc.kw>1</> point of <@cc.kw>Causality</> for every <@cc.kw>1</> Morale consumed

cc_w_ncdeer2.name: Karma
cc_w_ncdeer2.desc: Whenever a recipe that consumes <@cc.kw>8</> Morale fails to produce a byproduct, gain <@cc.kw>1</> point of <@cc.kw>Karma</> for every <@cc.kw>1</> Morale consumed

cc_t_accmuguard1.name: Martial Arts
cc_t_accmuguard1.desc: Accumulate <@cc.kw>1</> point when assisting with Specialization training to level 1, <@cc.kw>2</> points to level 2, and <@cc.kw>3</> points at level 3, with a maximum accumulation limit of <@cc.kw>3</> points (cannot be accumulated or consumed when the Trainer's Morale is 0)
